title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4050.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4050.2 - Scope

State Regulations

This Subchapter, including Article 2 thereof, shall
govern all steeplechases, hurdle races and hunt meetings, except insofar as any
of such sections may be inconsistent with the sections set forth in this

Article. In the event of any dispute as to the applicability of any such
sections to steeplechases, hurdle races or hunt meetings, the stewards of the
meeting are hereby given power to finally determine the same. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4050.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
